item.title: Reinforced Cross-Domain Knowledge Distillation on Time Series Data
item.description: Reinforced Cross-Domain Knowledge Distillation (RCD-KD) dynamically selects target samples for efficient knowledge transfer from a complex teacher model to a compact student model, achieving superior …
